1112.content: You were down in Mexico on Spring Break. Your friends had convinced you to go bungee jumping. You should have known better. You saw that the line was frayed, but let them tie you up anyway. It help for the first few seconds and then in snapped. You close your eyes and can still see the rocks and the river rushing towards you. You shiver as you remember the pain when your body crashed against the jagged rocks. That was the last thing you felt before you died, but that wasn't the end. Your body was washed several miles down the river. On its journey downstream it changed and you washed ashore. When you opened your eyes you at first thought that the fall must have not been that bad and then you noticed you weren't you anymore. Before the jump you were a..........
1112.title: Bungee jumping failure

11121.content:
Before you jumped, you were a college student on Spring Break. You had gone off on vacation with some classmates and they convinced you to try bungee jumping. You were skeptical at first, but they reassured you that it was 100% safe....they were so wrong

After the fall, you awoke on shore, you were surprised to be alive! You thought for sure the fall would have killed you! But here you are! Alive and well!!

However, as you stood up something felt off....

You looked down at yourself to discover that you were....
11121.title: Young man

11123.content:
Before you died, you remember that you were Kristie Holms, a 27 year old woman who desperately needed some kind of excitement in your life, so you decided to do something crazy and totally out of character for you ... bungee jumping ... you would have thought you would never do something that crazy and now you know why.

As you get your whit's about you, you look at yourself and see that you now occupy the body of a 10 year old boy, looking around you notice you are now in a park, which park you don't know... which state ... you do not know ... all you see when you look around is open fields on one side and forested fields on the other.
You think to yourself that you must be in a huge protected nature preserve, because the only structure that you can see for miles is a lonely cabin off to your left nestled in front of the forested fields, you see a park ranger vehicle parked in front of the structure.

You are so happy that you have found someone way out here in no mans land and rush over to the building, as you get closer you realize that the structure is a newly built restroom made for people on their long hiking trips , as you enter the restroom you do not see anyone and you are reminded that you need to use the bathroom, you also notice there are no urnials, just a row of stalls.

125.content:
I was born in in 1924 I'm 90 years old I've had a good life sadly i've seen my children die, i had one daughter and two sons, my two sons died in Vietnam but they both left two sons each and my daughter had four children three daughters and one son.

i love all my grandchildren and great grand children, my life has been pretty good i spent 20 years in the army by the time i left i was a General and then i built myself a business up it transport and logistics, it became very big then i sold it off for 900 million and i was set for the rest off my life at that point i was 70 years old.

anyway my family are very good to me and never ask for anything, the night i had a heart attack it was a normal night i didn't feel any different i had plans to see my family the next day and see how my great grand daughter is she is 20 and pregnant with my first two great great grand daughters there twins of cause and she is due any day now.

funny thing is she gave birth at the some time as you had the heart attack

i got into bed and fell asleep felt a slight pain to open my eyes the next morning to hear my name on the TV that is in my room, no change there hey you thought to yourself then you thought better see my family today.

you discover you are?

info.brief_description: You were born immortal but with a catch.
info.description:
You were born immortal but with a catch. Every time you're mortally wounded you regenerate, but just like a Time Lord in Dr. Who you get a new body. There is no telling who you will be, male, female, black, white, Asian, young, or old. You have no control over it. You also never repeat a form. Once you change into somebody else the other form is gone for good.
No vore
Sex is ok but keep it hetro, no gay
No expansion or shrinking.
